name: SCREAM DREAM
description:
The Screamer stands alone, a vista of blasted orange and blue noise swirling in the background.  Shadows loom, boiling into existence...

The Screamer knows the time to run has come.

The time to SCREAM has come!

AaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaAaA!

-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --  -- -- --

The game is about cooperation between the Screamer and the Painter.

The Screamer runs, as far as the Screamer can, to the right while dodging enemies and other perils.

The Painter helps the Screamer by drawing platforms across pits, over enemies, blocking projectiles...

Controls Player 1: The Screamer
Player 2: The Painter SCREAMER: d-pad controller or WASD; PAINTER: draw platforms with mouse or touch! CREDITS
